# PDF2U

ðŸ“œPDF perfect translator to you.

![help](docs/help.png)

## Install

### uv

Windows

```powershell
powershell -ExecutionPolicy ByPass -c "irm https://astral.sh/uv/install.ps1 | iex"
```

Linux

```bash
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh
```

### pdf2u

```bash
uv tool install pdf2u
```
